content: In this segment, the bodies will slowly walk toward Jinchi in the middle of the arena, appearing slowly at first, but soon swarming from all sides. If any of them reach a spot close to the center, they’ll be absorbed by Jinchi giving him part of his health bar back.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Jinchi.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Jinchi', specifically from the subsection 'Elder Jinchi Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
In this segment, the bodies will slowly walk toward Jinchi in the middle of the arena, appearing slowly at first, but soon swarming from all sides. If any of them reach a spot close to the center, they’ll be absorbed by Jinchi giving him part of his health bar back.
